JOB DESCRIPTION: Knowledge of asp .net, C#, SQL, and Oracle.      Basic knowledge of Business Processes is a must.      The candidate will have to understand the client requirements and accordingly design the software.      The candidate will be responsible for Installation, training, and troubleshooting.      The candidate will have to visit client's place as and when required. (Male Candidate only)      Our software is for business processes only.

EDUCATION.UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, BCA in Any Specialization
